name: Enrique Santos Discépolo
description: '''Enrique Santos Discépolo''' ('''''Discepolín''''') (11 March 1901 – 27 December 1951) was an [[Argentine]] [[tango (music)|tango]] and [[Milonga (music)|milonga]] musician and composer, author of famous tangos like ''Cambalache'' and many others performed by several of the most important singers of his time, amongst them notably [[Carlos Gardel]]. He was also a filmmaker, actor and screenwriter.
